data.convo: You're in great shape , Keith . Do you work out at a gym ? Yeah , I do . I guess I'm a real fitness freak . So , how often do you work out ? Well , I do aerobics every day after work . And then I play racquetball . Say , I like racquetball , too . Oh , do you want to play sometime ? Uh ... how well do you play ? Pretty well , I guess . Well , all right . But I'm not very good . No problem , Rod . I won't play too hard .
